column2: BRIEF-Prestige Consumer Healthcare Reports Fiscal 2020 Q4 And Full-Year Results May 7 (Reuters) - Prestige Consumer Healthcare Inc: * . REPORTS FISCAL 2020 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL-YEAR RESULTS * Q4 REVENUE $251.2 MILLION VERSUS REFINITIV IBES ESTIMATE OF $239.8 MILLION * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE ESTIMATE $0.74 -- REFINITIV IBES DATA * ANTICIPATE REVENUES OF APPROXIMATELY $220 MILLION OR MORE IN FISCAL Q1 2021 * FOR FISCAL 2021 ANTICIPATE AN UNCERTAIN ENVIRONMENT DUE TO MANY FACTORS RESULTING FROM COVID-19 * Q1 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.70, REVENUE VIEW $232.7 MILLION -- REFINITIV IBES DATA Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:

BRIEF-Prestige Brands Holdings Q4 Adjusted Earnings Per Share $0.62 May 10 (Reuters) - Prestige Brands Holdings Inc: * PRESTIGE BRANDS HOLDINGS, INC. REPORTS FISCAL 2018 FOURTH QUARTER AND FULL YEAR RESULTS; PROVIDES FISCAL 2019 OUTLOOK * Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW $0.61 -- THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S * REVENUES IN THE FOURTH QUARTER OF FISCAL 2018 INCREASED 6.4% TO $256.0 MILLION * BOARD OF DIRECTORS AUTHORIZES NEW $50 MILLION SHARE REPURCHASE PROGRAM * SEES FY 2019 FREE CASH FLOW OF $215 MILLION OR MORE Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
